unnormalised: **Gari Khobor: Tel-kharach kamti do Tej-teh badha-akana**
normalised: **Gari-motor khobor: Tehel kam kharchaw reyaḥ ulih do joṛ daram kana**

unnormalised: Nawa Delhi - Jemon petrol-a daam aste-haste bodol-kan-a, Bharat re ko kirin dohoiye ko gari kirin samay re tel-kharach kamti do bes-teh ag-a lagao-a. IIT Madras re khoj dohoiye Dr. Anjali Sharma utang ked-a jeh horma marang horoh menah-a: "Kirin dohoiye ko, marang saharniyateh jemon Mumbai ar Chennai re menah ko do, 'tinang tel jom-a?' (tel kharach kamti) hisab-a do nowa saring khon do bes marang-a."
normalised: Nuwa Dilli - Petrol daam ujhar dohon re menak-a khan, Bharat reyaḥ rashi ko do gari kin kin doho khan, tehel kam kharchaw do jasti kin sahan kana. Doctor Anjali Sharma, je do I I T Madras reyaḥ mitṭen khojiyen menaya, uni do mitṭen barhaw dohon reyaḥ ulih do uni do laiyeda: "Gari kin kin ko do, khas kore Mumbai ar Chennai lekha metropol shahar re menak ko do, nit do ad kalom khon jasti do 'kitna deti hai?' (tehel kam kharchaw) do kin sahan kana."

unnormalised: Marang-marang gari banaw dohoiye ko do sudhar injin ar halka gari banaw-teh jabab ema-a kana. Maruti Suzuki do nawa-nawa teh utang ked-a jeh onko-a marang Alto 800 model-re tel-kharach kamti do 15% sudhar-akana. Nowa do din-din teh marang paisa bachao-teh bodol-a, jahan do mul kharach-a ferok do sanam-teh bodol-a.
normalised: Barpe garimaker company ko do sudhriyao enjin technology ar haluk gari design sahạyete do ko badlayeť kana. Maruti Suzuki do holang do uni do lailada je uni do uni reyaḥ chalak Alto 800 model re do tehel kam kharchaw re do 15 percent sudhriyaw do hęćakan-a. Noa do din-hilok do barhoj paisa bachaw do uni do dekhaweda, hatiyaw doho do pahila reyaḥ dam beṛhed do uni do kami kedea.

unnormalised: Sarkar do tel-kharach kamti lagin koda niyam doho-a lagin hon jor-a lagao-a kana. Urja Bachao Vibhag (BEE) do nowa sirma mudih-teh gari ko lagin nawa tara rating ko sari-a lagin asra menah-a. Gyani ko lele keda jeh hiju-kan BS-VI phase II hawan badhaw niyam do banaw dohoiye ko nawa-nawa bishesh doho lagin ar hon jor-a. Nowa do CNG ar Ethanol lekateh bodol tel ko khoj doho lagin hon doho-a.
normalised: Sarkar do hijuk din re do tehel kam kharchaw reyaḥ saṭar niyam ko do uni do chalaweda. Bureau of Energy Efficiency (B E E) do sari do bachar mudhuṛ re do gari ko lagiť do sudhriyaw sitara rating do uni do laiyeť kana. Mahir ko do laiyeda je hijuk B S-V I Phase Two emission niyam ko do garimaker ko do sudhriyaw do ko chahaw doho do ko barhaw kedea. Noa do C N G ar Ethanol lekha beṛhed tehel khojiyaw do uni do sahami kedea.

unnormalised: Injin taknik-a bahreh, gari chalaw doho niyam sudhar ar tyre re hawa thik-thak doho do tel-kharach kamti marang lagin hon marang-a menah-a. Horoh-teh saging bodol-ko hon, jemon tej-teh chalaw do bachao doho, do har mahina re marang Rs. bachao-teh bodol-a. Mudi khon, chalao gari chalaw ar bishesh gari ko do Bharat-a tej-teh badah-kan gari bazaa re paisa bachao ar hawan badhaw kamti lagin marang chaabi menah-a. Nawa-nawa khoj-re utang ked-a jeh ko kirin dohoiye ko do tel-kharach kamti model ko lagin beshi Rs. 20,000 ema lagin marang-a doho-a, jodi hon nowa do horoh-teh saging gari 300 litre boot space dohoiye gari doho-teh manaw doho-a.
normalised: Enjin technology khon laha do, driving doho reyaḥ sudhriyaw ar tire do sari do purna hawa te bharao dohon do uni do tehel kam kharchaw do uni do jasti do uni do chahaw kedea. Hatiyaw doho do hoṛmo reyaḥ kami do, jemon jhati te chalaw doho do uni do kami doho do, mitṭen chandow re do barhoj takak bachaw do uni do dekhaweda. Akhirokar, sahan doho driving do doho ar kām doho gari sahạyete do Bharat reyaḥ rimaṛ bahaok dohon automative bazar re do paisa bachaw ar dhuan kami dohon re do chaṛhak do uni do chahaweda. Holang reyaḥ mitṭen jach do dekhaweda je rashi ko do tehel kam kharchaw model ko lagiť do besi takak bis hajaria do ko khusi doho do ko khusi kedea, hatiyaw doho do hoṛmo re do kichhu kami gari sahạyete, je do 300 liter reyaḥ boot space do menaka.
